question.sentence: Unless I'm late, I drive very slowly.
If you sit out in the sun, you'll feel thirsty.
If my girlfriend cooks lunch, I cook supper.
Unless we're very tired, we'll go to bed at midnight.
If you do well at school, you'll feel very pleased.
Unless it's raining, we do some gardening at the weekend.
If they have time, they write to us.
Unless I go fishing, I'll sleep in late on Sunday.
Unless there's a good film on TV, we go for a walk after supper.
If they catch the first train, they'll get to work by 9 o'clock.
